Stop Glorifying Hiring Posts – It’s Modern Day Exploitation.Every other day, some "IT company" or "digital marketing agency" posts:"We’re hiring!""Looking for passionate freshers.""Salary: ₹25K–₹30K depending on skills."Truth?They don’t even pay ₹10K properly.Forget monthly salary – they can’t even afford ₹500 a day.Still, they start companies like it's a trend.Buy a laptop, make a logo, open an Instagram page – boom, you're a CEO.Start posting hiring ads, trap freshers, squeeze every drop of work from them,then delay payments or never pay at all.They promise weekends off – Saturday & Sunday – just to fool candidates.In reality, it’s unpaid overtime, constant pressure, and zero respect.They don’t hire employees – they hire free labour in the name of “internship” or “trial period.”They want trained people, multi-skilled, available 24/7 – but cheap or unpaid.The question is not whether you're hiring…The real question is – are you building a company or running a scam?To all the so-called employers reading this –Only hire if you can afford to pay.If not, stop wasting people’s time. Stop scamming freshers.LinkedIn isn’t just for polished hiring ads –It’s also a space to expose the truth.hashtag#FakeHiring hashtag#DigitalMarketingScams hashtag#InternshipExploitationhashtag#ModernSlaveryInDisguise hashtag#SpeakUp hashtag#FreshersDeserveBetter hashtag#StopUsingPeople

Stop Glorifying Hiring Posts – It’s Modern Day Exploitation.Every other day, some "IT company" or "digital marketing agency" posts:"We’re hiring!""Looking for passionate freshers.""Salary: ₹25K–₹30K depending on skills."Truth?They don’t even pay ₹10K properly.Forget monthly salary – they can’t even afford ₹500 a day.Still, they start companies like it's a trend.Buy a laptop, make a logo, open an Instagram page – boom, you're a CEO.Start posting hiring ads, trap freshers, squeeze every drop of work from them,then delay payments or never pay at all.They promise weekends off – Saturday & Sunday – just to fool candidates.In reality, it’s unpaid overtime, constant pressure, and zero respect.They don’t hire employees – they hire free labour in the name of “internship” or “trial period.”They want trained people, multi-skilled, available 24/7 – but cheap or unpaid.The question is not whether you're hiring…The real question is – are you building a company or running a scam?To all the so-called employers reading this –Only hire if you can afford to pay.If not, stop wasting people’s time. Stop scamming freshers.LinkedIn isn’t just for polished hiring ads –It’s also a space to expose the truth.hashtag#FakeHiring hashtag#DigitalMarketingScams hashtag#InternshipExploitationhashtag#ModernSlaveryInDisguise hashtag#SpeakUp hashtag#FreshersDeserveBetter hashtag#StopUsingPeople

Stop Glorifying Hiring Posts – It’s Modern Day Exploitation.Every other day, some "IT company" or "digital marketing agency" posts:"We’re hiring!""Looking for passionate freshers.""Salary: ₹25K–₹30K depending on skills."Truth?They don’t even pay ₹10K properly.Forget monthly salary – they can’t even afford ₹500 a day.Still, they start companies like it's a trend.Buy a laptop, make a logo, open an Instagram page – boom, you're a CEO.Start posting hiring ads, trap freshers, squeeze every drop of work from them,then delay payments or never pay at all.They promise weekends off – Saturday & Sunday – just to fool candidates.In reality, it’s unpaid overtime, constant pressure, and zero respect.They don’t hire employees – they hire free labour in the name of “internship” or “trial period.”They want trained people, multi-skilled, available 24/7 – but cheap or unpaid.The question is not whether you're hiring…The real question is – are you building a company or running a scam?To all the so-called employers reading this –Only hire if you can afford to pay.If not, stop wasting people’s time. Stop scamming freshers.LinkedIn isn’t just for polished hiring ads –It’s also a space to expose the truth.hashtag#FakeHiring hashtag#DigitalMarketingScams hashtag#InternshipExploitationhashtag#ModernSlaveryInDisguise hashtag#SpeakUp hashtag#FreshersDeserveBetter hashtag#StopUsingPeople

Stop Glorifying Hiring Posts – It’s Modern Day Exploitation.Every other day, some "IT company" or "digital marketing agency" posts:"We’re hiring!""Looking for passionate freshers.""Salary: ₹25K–₹30K depending on skills."Truth?They don’t even pay ₹10K properly.Forget monthly salary – they can’t even afford ₹500 a day.Still, they start companies like it's a trend.Buy a laptop, make a logo, open an Instagram page – boom, you're a CEO.Start posting hiring ads, trap freshers, squeeze every drop of work from them,then delay payments or never pay at all.They promise weekends off – Saturday & Sunday – just to fool candidates.In reality, it’s unpaid overtime, constant pressure, and zero respect.They don’t hire employees – they hire free labour in the name of “internship” or “trial period.”They want trained people, multi-skilled, available 24/7 – but cheap or unpaid.The question is not whether you're hiring…The real question is – are you building a company or running a scam?To all the so-called employers reading this –Only hire if you can afford to pay.If not, stop wasting people’s time. Stop scamming freshers.LinkedIn isn’t just for polished hiring ads –It’s also a space to expose the truth.hashtag#FakeHiring hashtag#DigitalMarketingScams hashtag#InternshipExploitationhashtag#ModernSlaveryInDisguise hashtag#SpeakUp hashtag#FreshersDeserveBetter hashtag#StopUsingPeople

Stop Glorifying Hiring Posts – It’s Modern Day Exploitation.Every other day, some "IT company" or "digital marketing agency" posts:"We’re hiring!""Looking for passionate freshers.""Salary: ₹25K–₹30K depending on skills."Truth?They don’t even pay ₹10K properly.Forget monthly salary – they can’t even afford ₹500 a day.Still, they start companies like it's a trend.Buy a laptop, make a logo, open an Instagram page – boom, you're a CEO.Start posting hiring ads, trap freshers, squeeze every drop of work from them,then delay payments or never pay at all.They promise weekends off – Saturday & Sunday – just to fool candidates.In reality, it’s unpaid overtime, constant pressure, and zero respect.They don’t hire employees – they hire free labour in the name of “internship” or “trial period.”They want trained people, multi-skilled, available 24/7 – but cheap or unpaid.The question is not whether you're hiring…The real question is – are you building a company or running a scam?To all the so-called employers reading this –Only hire if you can afford to pay.If not, stop wasting people’s time. Stop scamming freshers.LinkedIn isn’t just for polished hiring ads –It’s also a space to expose the truth.hashtag#FakeHiring hashtag#DigitalMarketingScams hashtag#InternshipExploitationhashtag#ModernSlaveryInDisguise hashtag#SpeakUp hashtag#FreshersDeserveBetter hashtag#StopUsingPeople

Stop Glorifying Hiring Posts – It’s Modern Day Exploitation.Every other day, some "IT company" or "digital marketing agency" posts:"We’re hiring!""Looking for passionate freshers.""Salary: ₹25K–₹30K depending on skills."Truth?They don’t even pay ₹10K properly.Forget monthly salary – they can’t even afford ₹500 a day.Still, they start companies like it's a trend.Buy a laptop, make a logo, open an Instagram page – boom, you're a CEO.Start posting hiring ads, trap freshers, squeeze every drop of work from them,then delay payments or never pay at all.They promise weekends off – Saturday & Sunday – just to fool candidates.In reality, it’s unpaid overtime, constant pressure, and zero respect.They don’t hire employees – they hire free labour in the name of “internship” or “trial period.”They want trained people, multi-skilled, available 24/7 – but cheap or unpaid.The question is not whether you're hiring…The real question is – are you building a company or running a scam?To all the so-called employers reading this –Only hire if you can afford to pay.If not, stop wasting people’s time. Stop scamming freshers.LinkedIn isn’t just for polished hiring ads –It’s also a space to expose the truth.hashtag#FakeHiring hashtag#DigitalMarketingScams hashtag#InternshipExploitationhashtag#ModernSlaveryInDisguise hashtag#SpeakUp hashtag#FreshersDeserveBetter hashtag#StopUsingPeople

Stop Glorifying Hiring Posts – It’s Modern Day Exploitation.Every other day, some "IT company" or "digital marketing agency" posts:"We’re hiring!""Looking for passionate freshers.""Salary: ₹25K–₹30K depending on skills."Truth?They don’t even pay ₹10K properly.Forget monthly salary – they can’t even afford ₹500 a day.Still, they start companies like it's a trend.Buy a laptop, make a logo, open an Instagram page – boom, you're a CEO.Start posting hiring ads, trap freshers, squeeze every drop of work from them,then delay payments or never pay at all.They promise weekends off – Saturday & Sunday – just to fool candidates.In reality, it’s unpaid overtime, constant pressure, and zero respect.They don’t hire employees – they hire free labour in the name of “internship” or “trial period.”They want trained people, multi-skilled, available 24/7 – but cheap or unpaid.The question is not whether you're hiring…The real question is – are you building a company or running a scam?To all the so-called employers reading this –Only hire if you can afford to pay.If not, stop wasting people’s time. Stop scamming freshers.LinkedIn isn’t just for polished hiring ads –It’s also a space to expose the truth.hashtag#FakeHiring hashtag#DigitalMarketingScams hashtag#InternshipExploitationhashtag#ModernSlaveryInDisguise hashtag#SpeakUp hashtag#FreshersDeserveBetter hashtag#StopUsingPeople

Stop Glorifying Hiring Posts – It’s Modern Day Exploitation.Every other day, some "IT company" or "digital marketing agency" posts:"We’re hiring!""Looking for passionate freshers.""Salary: ₹25K–₹30K depending on skills."Truth?They don’t even pay ₹10K properly.Forget monthly salary – they can’t even afford ₹500 a day.Still, they start companies like it's a trend.Buy a laptop, make a logo, open an Instagram page – boom, you're a CEO.Start posting hiring ads, trap freshers, squeeze every drop of work from them,then delay payments or never pay at all.They promise weekends off – Saturday & Sunday – just to fool candidates.In reality, it’s unpaid overtime, constant pressure, and zero respect.They don’t hire employees – they hire free labour in the name of “internship” or “trial period.”They want trained people, multi-skilled, available 24/7 – but cheap or unpaid.The question is not whether you're hiring…The real question is – are you building a company or running a scam?To all the so-called employers reading this –Only hire if you can afford to pay.If not, stop wasting people’s time. Stop scamming freshers.LinkedIn isn’t just for polished hiring ads –It’s also a space to expose the truth.hashtag#FakeHiring hashtag#DigitalMarketingScams hashtag#InternshipExploitationhashtag#ModernSlaveryInDisguise hashtag#SpeakUp hashtag#FreshersDeserveBetter hashtag#StopUsingPeople

Stop Glorifying Hiring Posts – It’s Modern Day Exploitation.Every other day, some "IT company" or "digital marketing agency" posts:"We’re hiring!""Looking for passionate freshers.""Salary: ₹25K–₹30K depending on skills."Truth?They don’t even pay ₹10K properly.Forget monthly salary – they can’t even afford ₹500 a day.Still, they start companies like it's a trend.Buy a laptop, make a logo, open an Instagram page – boom, you're a CEO.Start posting hiring ads, trap freshers, squeeze every drop of work from them,then delay payments or never pay at all.They promise weekends off – Saturday & Sunday – just to fool candidates.In reality, it’s unpaid overtime, constant pressure, and zero respect.They don’t hire employees – they hire free labour in the name of “internship” or “trial period.”They want trained people, multi-skilled, available 24/7 – but cheap or unpaid.The question is not whether you're hiring…The real question is – are you building a company or running a scam?To all the so-called employers reading this –Only hire if you can afford to pay.If not, stop wasting people’s time. Stop scamming freshers.LinkedIn isn’t just for polished hiring ads –It’s also a space to expose the truth.hashtag#FakeHiring hashtag#DigitalMarketingScams hashtag#InternshipExploitationhashtag#ModernSlaveryInDisguise hashtag#SpeakUp hashtag#FreshersDeserveBetter hashtag#StopUsingPeople

Stop Glorifying Hiring Posts – It’s Modern Day Exploitation.Every other day, some "IT company" or "digital marketing agency" posts:"We’re hiring!""Looking for passionate freshers.""Salary: ₹25K–₹30K depending on skills."Truth?They don’t even pay ₹10K properly.Forget monthly salary – they can’t even afford ₹500 a day.Still, they start companies like it's a trend.Buy a laptop, make a logo, open an Instagram page – boom, you're a CEO.Start posting hiring ads, trap freshers, squeeze every drop of work from them,then delay payments or never pay at all.They promise weekends off – Saturday & Sunday – just to fool candidates.In reality, it’s unpaid overtime, constant pressure, and zero respect.They don’t hire employees – they hire free labour in the name of “internship” or “trial period.”They want trained people, multi-skilled, available 24/7 – but cheap or unpaid.The question is not whether you're hiring…The real question is – are you building a company or running a scam?To all the so-called employers reading this –Only hire if you can afford to pay.If not, stop wasting people’s time. Stop scamming freshers.LinkedIn isn’t just for polished hiring ads –It’s also a space to expose the truth.hashtag#FakeHiring hashtag#DigitalMarketingScams hashtag#InternshipExploitationhashtag#ModernSlaveryInDisguise hashtag#SpeakUp hashtag#FreshersDeserveBetter hashtag#StopUsingPeople

Stop Glorifying Hiring Posts – It’s Modern Day Exploitation.Every other day, some "IT company" or "digital marketing agency" posts:"We’re hiring!""Looking for passionate freshers.""Salary: ₹25K–₹30K depending on skills."Truth?They don’t even pay ₹10K properly.Forget monthly salary – they can’t even afford ₹500 a day.Still, they start companies like it's a trend.Buy a laptop, make a logo, open an Instagram page – boom, you're a CEO.Start posting hiring ads, trap freshers, squeeze every drop of work from them,then delay payments or never pay at all.They promise weekends off – Saturday & Sunday – just to fool candidates.In reality, it’s unpaid overtime, constant pressure, and zero respect.They don’t hire employees – they hire free labour in the name of “internship” or “trial period.”They want trained people, multi-skilled, available 24/7 – but cheap or unpaid.The question is not whether you're hiring…The real question is – are you building a company or running a scam?To all the so-called employers reading this –Only hire if you can afford to pay.If not, stop wasting people’s time. Stop scamming freshers.LinkedIn isn’t just for polished hiring ads –It’s also a space to expose the truth.hashtag#FakeHiring hashtag#DigitalMarketingScams hashtag#InternshipExploitationhashtag#ModernSlaveryInDisguise hashtag#SpeakUp hashtag#FreshersDeserveBetter hashtag#StopUsingPeople

Stop Glorifying Hiring Posts – It’s Modern Day Exploitation.Every other day, some "IT company" or "digital marketing agency" posts:"We’re hiring!""Looking for passionate freshers.""Salary: ₹25K–₹30K depending on skills."Truth?They don’t even pay ₹10K properly.Forget monthly salary – they can’t even afford ₹500 a day.Still, they start companies like it's a trend.Buy a laptop, make a logo, open an Instagram page – boom, you're a CEO.Start posting hiring ads, trap freshers, squeeze every drop of work from them,then delay payments or never pay at all.They promise weekends off – Saturday & Sunday – just to fool candidates.In reality, it’s unpaid overtime, constant pressure, and zero respect.They don’t hire employees – they hire free labour in the name of “internship” or “trial period.”They want trained people, multi-skilled, available 24/7 – but cheap or unpaid.The question is not whether you're hiring…The real question is – are you building a company or running a scam?To all the so-called employers reading this –Only hire if you can afford to pay.If not, stop wasting people’s time. Stop scamming freshers.LinkedIn isn’t just for polished hiring ads –It’s also a space to expose the truth.hashtag#FakeHiring hashtag#DigitalMarketingScams hashtag#InternshipExploitationhashtag#ModernSlaveryInDisguise hashtag#SpeakUp hashtag#FreshersDeserveBetter hashtag#StopUsingPeople

Stop Glorifying Hiring Posts – It’s Modern Day Exploitation.Every other day, some "IT company" or "digital marketing agency" posts:"We’re hiring!""Looking for passionate freshers.""Salary: ₹25K–₹30K depending on skills."Truth?They don’t even pay ₹10K properly.Forget monthly salary – they can’t even afford ₹500 a day.Still, they start companies like it's a trend.Buy a laptop, make a logo, open an Instagram page – boom, you're a CEO.Start posting hiring ads, trap freshers, squeeze every drop of work from them,then delay payments or never pay at all.They promise weekends off – Saturday & Sunday – just to fool candidates.In reality, it’s unpaid overtime, constant pressure, and zero respect.They don’t hire employees – they hire free labour in the name of “internship” or “trial period.”They want trained people, multi-skilled, available 24/7 – but cheap or unpaid.The question is not whether you're hiring…The real question is – are you building a company or running a scam?To all the so-called employers reading this –Only hire if you can afford to pay.If not, stop wasting people’s time. Stop scamming freshers.LinkedIn isn’t just for polished hiring ads –It’s also a space to expose the truth.hashtag#FakeHiring hashtag#DigitalMarketingScams hashtag#InternshipExploitationhashtag#ModernSlaveryInDisguise hashtag#SpeakUp hashtag#FreshersDeserveBetter hashtag#StopUsingPeople

Stop Glorifying Hiring Posts – It’s Modern Day Exploitation.Every other day, some "IT company" or "digital marketing agency" posts:"We’re hiring!""Looking for passionate freshers.""Salary: ₹25K–₹30K depending on skills."Truth?They don’t even pay ₹10K properly.Forget monthly salary – they can’t even afford ₹500 a day.Still, they start companies like it's a trend.Buy a laptop, make a logo, open an Instagram page – boom, you're a CEO.Start posting hiring ads, trap freshers, squeeze every drop of work from them,then delay payments or never pay at all.They promise weekends off – Saturday & Sunday – just to fool candidates.In reality, it’s unpaid overtime, constant pressure, and zero respect.They don’t hire employees – they hire free labour in the name of “internship” or “trial period.”They want trained people, multi-skilled, available 24/7 – but cheap or unpaid.The question is not whether you're hiring…The real question is – are you building a company or running a scam?To all the so-called employers reading this –Only hire if you can afford to pay.If not, stop wasting people’s time. Stop scamming freshers.LinkedIn isn’t just for polished hiring ads –It’s also a space to expose the truth.hashtag#FakeHiring hashtag#DigitalMarketingScams hashtag#InternshipExploitationhashtag#ModernSlaveryInDisguise hashtag#SpeakUp hashtag#FreshersDeserveBetter hashtag#StopUsingPeople

Stop Glorifying Hiring Posts – It’s Modern Day Exploitation.Every other day, some "IT company" or "digital marketing agency" posts:"We’re hiring!""Looking for passionate freshers.""Salary: ₹25K–₹30K depending on skills."Truth?They don’t even pay ₹10K properly.Forget monthly salary – they can’t even afford ₹500 a day.Still, they start companies like it's a trend.Buy a laptop, make a logo, open an Instagram page – boom, you're a CEO.Start posting hiring ads, trap freshers, squeeze every drop of work from them,then delay payments or never pay at all.They promise weekends off – Saturday & Sunday – just to fool candidates.In reality, it’s unpaid overtime, constant pressure, and zero respect.They don’t hire employees – they hire free labour in the name of “internship” or “trial period.”They want trained people, multi-skilled, available 24/7 – but cheap or unpaid.The question is not whether you're hiring…The real question is – are you building a company or running a scam?To all the so-called employers reading this –Only hire if you can afford to pay.If not, stop wasting people’s time. Stop scamming freshers.LinkedIn isn’t just for polished hiring ads –It’s also a space to expose the truth.hashtag#FakeHiring hashtag#DigitalMarketingScams hashtag#InternshipExploitationhashtag#ModernSlaveryInDisguise hashtag#SpeakUp hashtag#FreshersDeserveBetter hashtag#StopUsingPeople

Stop Glorifying Hiring Posts – It’s Modern Day Exploitation.Every other day, some "IT company" or "digital marketing agency" posts:"We’re hiring!""Looking for passionate freshers.""Salary: ₹25K–₹30K depending on skills."Truth?They don’t even pay ₹10K properly.Forget monthly salary – they can’t even afford ₹500 a day.Still, they start companies like it's a trend.Buy a laptop, make a logo, open an Instagram page – boom, you're a CEO.Start posting hiring ads, trap freshers, squeeze every drop of work from them,then delay payments or never pay at all.They promise weekends off – Saturday & Sunday – just to fool candidates.In reality, it’s unpaid overtime, constant pressure, and zero respect.They don’t hire employees – they hire free labour in the name of “internship” or “trial period.”They want trained people, multi-skilled, available 24/7 – but cheap or unpaid.The question is not whether you're hiring…The real question is – are you building a company or running a scam?To all the so-called employers reading this –Only hire if you can afford to pay.If not, stop wasting people’s time. Stop Glorifying Hiring Posts – It’s Modern Day Exploitation.Every other day, some "IT company" or "digital marketing agency" posts:"We’re hiring!""Looking for passionate freshers.""Salary: ₹25K–₹30K depending on skills."Truth?They don’t even pay ₹10K properly.Forget monthly salary – they can’t even afford ₹500 a day.Still, they start companies like it's a trend.Buy a laptop, make a logo, open an Instagram page – boom, you're a CEO.Start posting hiring ads, trap freshers, squeeze every drop of work from them,then delay payments or never pay at all.They promise weekends off – Saturday & Sunday – just to fool candidates.In reality, it’s unpaid overtime, constant pressure, and zero respect.They don’t hire employees – they hire free labour in the name of “internship” or “trial period.”They want trained people, multi-skilled, available 24/7 – but cheap or unpaid.The question is not whether you're hiring…The real question is – are you building a company or running a scam?To all the so-called employers reading this –Only hire if you can afford to pay.If not, stop wasting people’s time. Stop Glorifying Hiring Posts – It’s Modern Day Exploitation.Every other day, some "IT company" or "digital marketing agency" posts:"We’re hiring!""Looking for passionate freshers.""Salary: ₹25K–₹30K depending on skills."Truth?They don’t even pay ₹10K properly.Forget monthly salary – they can’t even afford ₹500 a day.Still, they start companies like it's a trend.Buy a laptop, make a logo, open an Instagram page – boom, you're a CEO.Start posting hiring ads, trap freshers, squeeze every drop of work from them,then delay payments or never pay at all.They promise weekends off – Saturday & Sunday – just to fool candidates.In reality, it’s unpaid overtime, constant pressure, and zero respect.They don’t hire employees – they hire free labour in the name of “internship” or “trial period.”They want trained people, multi-skilled, available 24/7 – but cheap or unpaid.The question is not whether you're hiring…The real question is – are you building a company or running a scam?To all the so-called employers reading this –Only hire if you can afford to pay.If not, stop wasting people’s time. Stop scamming freshers.LinkedIn isn’t just for polished hiring ads –It’s also a space to expose the truth.hashtag#FakeHiring hashtag#DigitalMarketingScams hashtag#InternshipExploitationhashtag#ModernSlaveryInDisguise hashtag#SpeakUp hashtag#FreshersDeserveBetter hashtag#StopUsingPeople

Stop Glorifying Hiring Posts – It’s Modern Day Exploitation.Every other day, some "IT company" or "digital marketing agency" posts:"We’re hiring!""Looking for passionate freshers.""Salary: ₹25K–₹30K depending on skills."Truth?They don’t even pay ₹10K properly.Forget monthly salary – they can’t even afford ₹500 a day.Still, they start companies like it's a trend.Buy a laptop, make a logo, open an Instagram page – boom, you're a CEO.Start posting hiring ads, trap freshers, squeeze every drop of work from them,then delay payments or never pay at all.They promise weekends off – Saturday & Sunday – just to fool candidates.In reality, it’s unpaid overtime, constant pressure, and zero respect.They don’t hire employees – they hire free labour in the name of “internship” or “trial period.”They want trained people, multi-skilled, available 24/7 – but cheap or unpaid.The question is not whether you're hiring…The real question is – are you building a company or running a scam?To all the so-called employers reading this –Only hire if you can afford to pay.If not, stop wasting people’s time. Stop scamming freshers.LinkedIn isn’t just for polished hiring ads –It’s also a space to expose the truth.hashtag#FakeHiring hashtag#DigitalMarketingScams hashtag#InternshipExploitationhashtag#ModernSlaveryInDisguise hashtag#SpeakUp hashtag#FreshersDeserveBetter hashtag#StopUsingPeople

Stop Glorifying Hiring Posts – It’s Modern Day Exploitation.Every other day, some "IT company" or "digital marketing agency" posts:"We’re hiring!""Looking for passionate freshers.""Salary: ₹25K–₹30K depending on skills."Truth?They don’t even pay ₹10K properly.Forget monthly salary – they can’t even afford ₹500 a day.Still, they start companies like it's a trend.Buy a laptop, make a logo, open an Instagram page – boom, you're a CEO.Start posting hiring ads, trap freshers, squeeze every drop of work from them,then delay payments or never pay at all.They promise weekends off – Saturday & Sunday – just to fool candidates.In reality, it’s unpaid overtime, constant pressure, and zero respect.They don’t hire employees – they hire free labour in the name of “internship” or “trial period.”They want trained people, multi-skilled, available 24/7 – but cheap or unpaid.The question is not whether you're hiring…The real question is – are you building a company or running a scam?To all the so-called employers reading this –Only hire if you can afford to pay.If not, stop wasting people’s time. Stop scamming freshers.LinkedIn isn’t just for polished hiring ads –It’s also a space to expose the truth.hashtag#FakeHiring hashtag#DigitalMarketingScams hashtag#InternshipExploitationhashtag#ModernSlaveryInDisguise hashtag#SpeakUp hashtag#FreshersDeserveBetter hashtag#StopUsingPeople

Stop Glorifying Hiring Posts – It’s Modern Day Exploitation.Every other day, some "IT company" or "digital marketing agency" posts:"We’re hiring!""Looking for passionate freshers.""Salary: ₹25K–₹30K depending on skills."Truth?They don’t even pay ₹10K properly.Forget monthly salary – they can’t even afford ₹500 a day.Still, they start companies like it's a trend.Buy a laptop, make a logo, open an Instagram page – boom, you're a CEO.Start posting hiring ads, trap freshers, squeeze every drop of work from them,then delay payments or never pay at all.They promise weekends off – Saturday & Sunday – just to fool candidates.In reality, it’s unpaid overtime, constant pressure, and zero respect.They don’t hire employees – they hire free labour in the name of “internship” or “trial period.”They want trained people, multi-skilled, available 24/7 – but cheap or unpaid.The question is not whether you're hiring…The real question is – are you building a company or running a scam?To all the so-called employers reading this –Only hire if you can afford to pay.If not, stop wasting people’s time. Stop Glorifying Hiring Posts – It’s Modern Day Exploitation.Every other day, some "IT company" or "digital marketing agency" posts:"We’re hiring!""Looking for passionate freshers.""Salary: ₹25K–₹30K depending on skills."Truth?They don’t even pay ₹10K properly.Forget monthly salary – they can’t even afford ₹500 a day.Still, they start companies like it's a trend.Buy a laptop, make a logo, open an Instagram page – boom, you're a CEO.Start posting hiring ads, trap freshers, squeeze every drop of work from them,then delay payments or never pay at all.They promise weekends off – Saturday & Sunday – just to fool candidates.In reality, it’s unpaid overtime, constant pressure, and zero respect.They don’t hire employees – they hire free labour in the name of “internship” or “trial period.”They want trained people, multi-skilled, available 24/7 – but cheap or unpaid.The question is not whether you're hiring…The real question is – are you building a company or running a scam?To all the so-called employers reading this –Only hire if you can afford to pay.If not, stop wasting people’s time. Stop scamming freshers.LinkedIn isn’t just for polished hiring ads –It’s also a space to expose the truth.hashtag#FakeHiring hashtag#DigitalMarketingScams hashtag#InternshipExploitationhashtag#ModernSlaveryInDisguise hashtag#SpeakUp hashtag#FreshersDeserveBetter hashtag#StopUsingPeople

Stop Glorifying Hiring Posts – It’s Modern Day Exploitation.Every other day, some "IT company" or "digital marketing agency" posts:"We’re hiring!""Looking for passionate freshers.""Salary: ₹25K–₹30K depending on skills."Truth?They don’t even pay ₹10K properly.Forget monthly salary – they can’t even afford ₹500 a day.Still, they start companies like it's a trend.Buy a laptop, make a logo, open an Instagram page – boom, you're a CEO.Start posting hiring ads, trap freshers, squeeze every drop of work from them,then delay payments or never pay at all.They promise weekends off – Saturday & Sunday – just to fool candidates.In reality, it’s unpaid overtime, constant pressure, and zero respect.They don’t hire employees – they hire free labour in the name of “internship” or “trial period.”They want trained people, multi-skilled, available 24/7 – but cheap or unpaid.The question is not whether you're hiring…The real question is – are you building a company or running a scam?To all the so-called employers reading this –Only hire if you can afford to pay.If not, stop wasting people’s time. Stop scamming freshers.LinkedIn isn’t just for polished hiring ads –It’s also a space to expose the truth.hashtag#FakeHiring hashtag#DigitalMarketingScams hashtag#InternshipExploitationhashtag#ModernSlaveryInDisguise hashtag#SpeakUp hashtag#FreshersDeserveBetter hashtag#StopUsingPeople

Stop Glorifying Hiring Posts – It’s Modern Day Exploitation.Every other day, some "IT company" or "digital marketing agency" posts:"We’re hiring!""Looking for passionate freshers.""Salary: ₹25K–₹30K depending on skills."Truth?They don’t even pay ₹10K properly.Forget monthly salary – they can’t even afford ₹500 a day.Still, they start companies like it's a trend.Buy a laptop, make a logo, open an Instagram page – boom, you're a CEO.Start posting hiring ads, trap freshers, squeeze every drop of work from them,then delay payments or never pay at all.They promise weekends off – Saturday & Sunday – just to fool candidates.In reality, it’s unpaid overtime, constant pressure, and zero respect.They don’t hire employees – they hire free labour in the name of “internship” or “trial period.”They want trained people, multi-skilled, available 24/7 – but cheap or unpaid.The question is not whether you're hiring…The real question is – are you building a company or running a scam?To all the so-called employers reading this –Only hire if you can afford to pay.If not, stop wasting people’s time. Stop scamming freshers.LinkedIn isn’t just for polished hiring ads –It’s also a space to expose the truth.hashtag#FakeHiring hashtag#DigitalMarketingScams hashtag#InternshipExploitationhashtag#ModernSlaveryInDisguise hashtag#SpeakUp hashtag#FreshersDeserveBetter hashtag#StopUsingPeople

Stop Glorifying Hiring Posts – It’s Modern Day Exploitation.Every other day, some "IT company" or "digital marketing agency" posts:"We’re hiring!""Looking for passionate freshers.""Salary: ₹25K–₹30K depending on skills."Truth?They don’t even pay ₹10K properly.Forget monthly salary – they can’t even afford ₹500 a day.Still, they start companies like it's a trend.Buy a laptop, make a logo, open an Instagram page – boom, you're a CEO.Start posting hiring ads, trap freshers, squeeze every drop of work from them,then delay payments or never pay at all.They promise weekends off – Saturday & Sunday – just to fool candidates.In reality, it’s unpaid overtime, constant pressure, and zero respect.They don’t hire employees – they hire free labour in the name of “internship” or “trial period.”They want trained people, multi-skilled, available 24/7 – but cheap or unpaid.The question is not whether you're hiring…The real question is – are you building a company or running a scam?To all the so-called employers reading this –Only hire if you can afford to pay.If not, stop wasting people’s time. Stop scamming freshers.LinkedIn isn’t just for polished hiring ads –It’s also a space to expose the truth.hashtag#FakeHiring hashtag#DigitalMarketingScams hashtag#InternshipExploitationhashtag#ModernSlaveryInDisguise hashtag#SpeakUp hashtag#FreshersDeserveBetter hashtag#StopUsingPeople

Stop Glorifying Hiring Posts – It’s Modern Day Exploitation.Every other day, some "IT company" or "digital marketing agency" posts:"We’re hiring!""Looking for passionate freshers.""Salary: ₹25K–₹30K depending on skills."Truth?They don’t even pay ₹10K properly.Forget monthly salary – they can’t even afford ₹500 a day.Still, they start companies like it's a trend.Buy a laptop, make a logo, open an Instagram page – boom, you're a CEO.Start posting hiring ads, trap freshers, squeeze every drop of work from them,then delay payments or never pay at all.They promise weekends off – Saturday & Sunday – just to fool candidates.In reality, it’s unpaid overtime, constant pressure, and zero respect.They don’t hire employees – they hire free labour in the name of “internship” or “trial period.”They want trained people, multi-skilled, available 24/7 – but cheap or unpaid.The question is not whether you're hiring…The real question is – are you building a company or running a scam?To all the so-called employers reading this –Only hire if you can afford to pay.If not, stop wasting people’s time. Stop scamming freshers.LinkedIn isn’t just for polished hiring ads –It’s also a space to expose the truth.hashtag#FakeHiring hashtag#DigitalMarketingScams hashtag#InternshipExploitationhashtag#ModernSlaveryInDisguise hashtag#SpeakUp hashtag#FreshersDeserveBetter hashtag#StopUsingPeople
